item.title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ Start your Emacs as a service on macOS startup
item.description: â­ Featured post â­ To read this content in portuguese, click here . If you want to start your Emacs as a service on the macOS startup, you need to have installed the Emacs plus , and after you have installed, execute this command:. brew services start d12frosted/emacs-plus/emacs-plus
